/* Variables for consistent colors */
:root {
  --dark-grey: #333333;
  --medium-grey: #444444;
  --light-grey: #f5f5f5;
  --white: #ffffff;
  --teal: #4ecdc4;
  --coral: #ff6b6b;
  --navy: #1a535c;
}

/* Base styling */
body {
  font-family: 'Raleway', sans-serif;
  color: var(--dark-grey);
  line-height: 1.7;
  background-color: var(--light-grey);
}

/* Navbar styling */
.navbar {
  background-color: var(--medium-grey) !important;
}

.navbar-brand, .nav-link {
  color: var(--white) !important;
}

.nav-link:hover {
  color: var(--teal) !important;
}

/* Heading styles */
h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 {
  color: var(--dark-grey);
}

h1 {
  font-size: 2.5em;
  border-bottom: 2px solid var(--teal);
  padding-bottom: 0.2em;
}

h2 {
  font-size: 2em;
  color: var(--medium-grey);
}

/* Link styling */
a {
  color: var(--teal);
  text-decoration: none;
  transition: color 0.2s ease;
}

a:hover {
  color: var(--coral);
  text-decoration: underline;
}

/* Quote styling */
blockquote {
  border-left: 4px solid var(--teal);
  padding-left: 1em;
  color: var(--medium-grey);
}

/* Content blocks */
.content-block {
  padding: 2em;
  margin-bottom: 2em;
  background-color: var(--white);
  border-radius: 5px;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
}

/* Skills section styling */
.skills-container {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  gap: 1.5em;
  margin-top: 2em;
}

.skill-card {
  background-color: var(--white);
  border-radius: 5px;
  border-top: 4px solid var(--teal);
  padding: 1.5em;
  flex: 1 1 300px;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.05);
  transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.skill-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px);
  border-top: 4px solid var(--coral);
}

.skill-card h3 {
  color: var(--medium-grey);
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--light-grey);
  padding-bottom: 0.5em;
}

/* Button styling */
.btn-primary {
  background-color: var(--teal);
  border-color: var(--teal);
  color: var(--white);
}

.btn-primary:hover {
  background-color: var(--navy);
  border-color: var(--navy);
}

/* Footer styling */
.footer, footer {
  background-color: var(--medium-grey);
  color: var(--white);
  padding: 2em 0;
  margin-top: 3em;
}

.footer a, footer a {
  color: var(--teal);
}

/* Project cards styling */
.project-card {
  background-color: var(--white);
  border-radius: 5px;
  overflow: hidden;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
  margin-bottom: 2em;
  transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.project-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px);
  box-shadow: 0 8px 16px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
}

.project-card img {
  width: 100%;
  height: 200px;
  object-fit: cover;
}

.project-card-content {
  padding: 1.5em;
}

.project-card h3 {
  margin-top: 0;
  color: var(--medium-grey);
}

.project-technologies {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  margin-top: 1em;
}

/* Contact page styling */
.contact-info {
  background-color: var(--white);
  border-radius: 5px;
  padding: 2em;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
  margin: 2em 0;
}

.contact-item {
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
}

.contact-item i {
  margin-right: 1rem;
  color: var(--teal);
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  width: 2rem;
  text-align: center;
}

.contact-item span {
  font-weight: bold;
  margin-right: 0.5rem;
  width: 5rem;
}

/* Experience page styling */
.experience-item {
  background-color: var(--white);
  border-radius: 5px;
  padding: 1.5em;
  margin-bottom: 1.5em;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.05);
  position: relative;
}

.experience-item::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  left: -20px;
  top: 50%;
  width: 20px;
  height: 2px;
  background-color: var(--teal);
}

.experience-date {
  color: var(--teal);
  font-weight: bold;
}

.experience-position {
  font-size: 1.3em;
  font-weight: bold;
  margin: 0.5em 0;
}

.experience-company {
  color: var(--medium-grey);
  margin-bottom: 1em;
}

/* Additional elements */
.badge {
  background-color: var(--teal);
  color: var(--white);
  padding: 0.3em 0.6em;
  border-radius: 3px;
  font-size: 0.8em;
  margin: 0.2em;
  display: inline-block;
}

.badge-secondary {
  background-color: var(--coral);
}

.badge-tertiary {
  background-color: var(--navy);
}

/* Highlight text */
.highlight {
  color: var(--teal);
  font-weight: bold;
}

/* Table styling */
table {
  width: 100%;
  border-collapse: collapse;
  margin: 2em 0;
  background-color: var(--white);
}

th {
  background-color: var(--medium-grey);
  color: var(--white);
  padding: 0.75em;
  text-align: left;
}

td {
  padding: 0.75em;
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--light-grey);
}

tr:hover {
  background-color: rgba(78, 205, 196, 0.1);
}

/* Responsive design */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .about-me-container {
    flex-direction: column-reverse;
  }
  
  .skills-container {
    flex-direction: column;
  }
  
  .contact-item {
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: flex-start;
  }
  
  .contact-item i {
    margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  }
}
